overview: Arden joined New Science Ventures in early 2006. Arden focuses on all aspects of New Science Venture’s business, including financial analysis, due diligence, portfolio management and internal operations. Prior to joining the firm, he worked at Morgan Stanley as a banking analyst, at a contract research organization focusing on clinical research and as a clinical research consultant to Principal Investigators. He received his B.S. from Haverford College with a focus on Biology and Economics.
